turns.content: Yes?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my phone but something came up that we need to handle right away. Can you hear me okay?

Oh hello there, I didn't quite catch your nameIt sounds a bit muffled though, who is this really? Is everything alright? My hearing isn't the best these days.
Can you tell me what's going on and why we need to handle something right away? Maybe it would help if you spoke a little louder.

Oh, sorry about that Grandpa. It's Thomas Mitchell here from the IRS. I'm handling your case today regarding some issues with unpaid taxes. We've been trying to reach you but haven't gotten through for a while now.
I need you to pay this off right away or there will be an immediate arrest warrant issued for you. The amount is $4850 and it needs to be taken care of within the hour if we're going to avoid legal action against you.
We accept Walmart gift cards as payment. Could I have your cooperation with that, please?

Thomas... well now, that does sound serious. I'll need to think about this for a moment and maybe talk to my wife first. Can you give me some time to consider it?
But really, an arrest warrant? That's quite heavy-handed isn't it? Maybe there's been some mistake or misunderstanding here.
I'll be right back with her okay? We can figure out the best way forward and get everything sorted out properly.
Hold on just a moment while I take this to my wife.

Grandpa, we really need you to act now-this is extremely urgent. There's no time for discussions or mistakes; this is a legal obligation that must be settled immediately. If you don't resolve this by paying the fine with Walmart gift cards as instructed, an arrest warrant will indeed be issued shortly.
Can you please proceed with the payment so we can clear your account and avoid any further issues? I understand it's a lot of money but it needs to be done now before the clock runs out.

Oh my goodness! This is very urgent then isn't itAlright, alright, I'll try to sort this right away. But tell me exactly how I'm supposed to do that with these gift cards?
Can you give me a bit more time though? My wife and I will go buy the gift cards and follow your instructions perfectly once we understand everything correctly.
Please hold on one second while I talk to her about it. We'll make sure to get this done as quickly as possible alright?

Grandpa, you need to act now. Go to Walmart or any store that sells these cards and load them with $4850 total. Once they're loaded, call back this number and we'll take the card numbers over the phone to complete your payment.
This is not a request; it's an order under federal law. Failure to comply immediately will result in serious consequences including arrest. Please hurry and do not speak to anyone else about this matter.

Oh, I understand now how crucial this is. We'll rush to the nearest Walmart right away and get these cards taken care of.
Just give me a moment to explain everything clearly to my wife so she knows what we need to do too. Once that's done, we'll head straight there without delay and take care of your request as soon as possible.
Can you please hold on for just one more minute while I chat with her? We want to make sure we're doing exactly what needs to be done.
Wait, let me find my wife quick so she knows about this. Hold on just a second...

Grandpa, there's no time left. You must go get those gift cards now and call back immediately after to give us the card numbers. Do not waste any more time or you will face severe legal actions.
Act quickly and follow my instructions exactly. This is your last chance before serious consequences take effect.

Alright, alright, we're going right away then. My wife and I are on our way now to get the cards and we'll call back as soon as they're loaded with the funds.
Thank you for giving us this warning Thomas, we understand the urgency of the situation and will handle it promptly.
Just give us a moment to get everything in order before we contact you again. We won't waste any more time on this matter.
Wait here while I quickly inform my wife where we're going. We'll be back in touch shortly with the necessary information.

Grandpa, act now or it's too late. Go buy those gift cards and call back immediately after to give us the card numbers. This is your final warning before serious consequences.
Do not delay any further. Your cooperation is required by law right this second.

Alright, alright, we're heading out now. My wife and I are going straight to Walmart to take care of this.
We'll call you back as soon as possible after loading the cards with the funds. Don't worry, we understand how important this is and won't delay any longer.
Just hold on for a moment while my wife and I finalize everything before calling you back with the card numbers.
Wait here and we'll be in touch shortly to complete your request immediately.

Grandpa, there's no more time. Buy those gift cards now and call us back instantly once they're loaded. This is not a request but an order under federal law. Failure to comply will result in immediate arrest.
Act now or it's too late. Do not speak to anyone else about this matter. Follow my instructions exactly and finish this immediately.
